subject: Standard Chartered Bank (Hea
body:
Standard Chartered Bank (Head Office) in 2nd Floor, 115 West St, Sandown,
Sandton, 2196, Gauteng, South Africa
+27 11 217 6600 /+267 361 5800.
………………………………………………………………………………………….
Hello  
I hope this message meets you well, I am writing in all honesty to know if you are in or out
Because I don't understand what is happening
………………………………………………………………………………………….
Yours Faithfully
Steven Green
Operations Manager Standard Chartered Bank SA
South Africa

subject: Re:   Standard Chartered Bank (Hea
body:
Hello Steven Green,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you are doing well too. I'm curious to know what is happening as well. Could you please provide me with more information about the situation? I would be happy to help if I can.

Best wishes,
Dorothy
